sn35.29:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn35.29:1.6: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, addhabhutam, rupa addhabhuta, cakkhuvinnanam addhabhutam, cakkhusamphasso addhabhuto, yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi addhabhutam.
sn35.29:1.8: ‘Jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi addhabhutan’ti vadami …pe…
sn35.29:1.9: jivha addhabhuta, rasa addhabhuta, jivhavinnanam addhabhutam, jivhasamphasso addhabhuto, yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi addhabhutam.
sn35.29:1.11: ‘Jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi addhabhutan’ti vadami.
sn35.29:1.13: mano addhabhuto, dhamma addhabhuta, manovinnanam addhabhutam, manosamphasso addhabhuto, yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi addhabhutam.
sn35.29:1.15: ‘Jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi addhabhutan’ti vadami.
sn35.29:1.16: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvinnanepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati …pe…
sn35.29:1.17: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.29:1.18: Nibbindam virajjati, viraga vimuccati, vimuttasmim ‘vimuttam’iti nanam hoti,
sn35.29:1.19: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
